block.l: if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0, 0x0B]; array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0, 0x0F]; array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0, 0x0C]; array.push(0x20); array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0, 0x0E]; for (i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {array.push(text.charCodeAt(i))} array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

block-definition.s: set LCD color to r %'red' g %'green' b %'blue'
block-definition.translations: de:setze LCD-Farbe auf r _ g _ b _

block.l: if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0,0x0D]; array.push(red); array.push(green); array.push(blue); array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; array = [0xF0, 0x0A]; array.push(state); array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));

inputs.input: D2D2 D3 D4 D5 D6 D7 D8 D9 D10 D11 D12 D13

block.l: tones = Array(); durations = Array(); inMelody = true;

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0,0x1A]; //Start SysEx, SysEx command array.push(pin); for (i=0; i<=durations.length; i++) { array.push(tones[i]); array.push(durations[i]); } array.push(0xF7); //End SysEx this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));
sum = 0; for(i = 0; i <= durations.length; i++) { if(parseInt(durations[i]) > 0) { sum += 1000/parseInt(durations[i]); } } return sum/1000;

block-definition.s: play note %'T' for %'D' beats on pin %'pin'
block-definition.translations: de:spiele Note _ mit Notenwert _ an Pin _

inputs.input: C300 B0 C1 CS1 D1 DS1 E1 F1 FS1 G1 GS1 A1 AS1 B1 C2 CS2 D2 DS2 E2 F2 FS2 G2 GS2 A2 AS2 B2 C3 CS3 D3 DS3 E3 F3 FS3 G3 GS3 A3 AS3 B3 C4 CS4 D4 DS4 E4 F4 FS4 G4 GS4 A4 AS4 B4
D2D2 D3 D4 D5 D6 D7 D8 D9 D10 D11 D12 D13

block.l: if(typeof inMelody == "undefined"){ inMelody = false; } if(!inMelody) { tones = Array(); durations = Array(); }

if(typeof tones == "undefined" || typeof durations == "undefined") return; if(T == "00") { tones.push(0); } if(T == "B0") { tones.push(31); } if(T == "C1") { tones.push(33); } if(T == "CS1") { tones.push(35); } if(T == "D1") { tones.push(37); } if(T == "DS1") { tones.push(39); } if(T == "E1") { tones.push(41); } if(T == "F1") { tones.push(44); } if(T == "FS1") { tones.push(46); } if(T == "G1") { tones.push(49); } if(T == "GS1") { tones.push(52); } if(T == "A1") { tones.push(55); } if(T == "AS1") { tones.push(58); } if(T == "B1") { tones.push(62); } if(T == "C2") { tones.push(65); } if(T == "CS2") { tones.push(69); } if(T == "D2") { tones.push(73); } if(T == "DS2") { tones.push(78); } if(T == "E2") { tones.push(82); } if(T == "F2") { tones.push(87); } if(T == "FS2") { tones.push(93); } if(T == "G2") { tones.push(98); } if(T == "GS2") { tones.push(104); } if(T == "A2") { tones.push(110); } if(T == "AS2") { tones.push(117); } if(T == "B2") { tones.push(123); } if(T == "C3") { tones.push(131); } if(T == "CS3") { tones.push(139); } if(T == "D3") { tones.push(147); } if(T == "DS3") { tones.push(156); } if(T == "E3") { tones.push(165); } if(T == "F3") { tones.push(175); } if(T == "FS3") { tones.push(185); } if(T == "G3") { tones.push(196); } if(T == "GS3") { tones.push(208); } if(T == "A3") { tones.push(220); } if(T == "AS3") { tones.push(233); } if(T == "B3") { tones.push(247); } if(T == "C4") { tones.push(262); } if(T == "CS4") { tones.push(277); } if(T == "D4") { tones.push(294); } if(T == "DS4") { tones.push(311); } if(T == "E4") { tones.push(330); } if(T == "F4") { tones.push(349); } if(T == "FS4") { tones.push(370); } if(T == "G4") { tones.push(392); } if(T == "GS4") { tones.push(415); } if(T == "A4") { tones.push(440); } if(T == "AS4") { tones.push(466); } if(T == "B4") { tones.push(494); } if(T == "C5") { tones.push(523); } if(T == "CS5") { tones.push(554); } if(T == "D5") { tones.push(587); } if(T == "DS5") { tones.push(622); } if(T == "E5") { tones.push(659); } if(T == "F5") { tones.push(698); } if(T == "FS5") { tones.push(740); } if(T == "G5") { tones.push(784); } if(T == "GS5") { tones.push(831); } if(T == "A5") { tones.push(880); } if(T == "AS5") { tones.push(932); } if(T == "B5") { tones.push(988); } if(T == "C6") { tones.push(1047); } if(T == "CS6") { tones.push(1109); } if(T == "D6") { tones.push(1175); } if(T == "DS6") { tones.push(1245); } if(T == "E6") { tones.push(1319); } if(T == "F6") { tones.push(1397); } if(T == "FS6") { tones.push(1480); } if(T == "G6") { tones.push(1568); } if(T == "GS6") { tones.push(1661); } if(T == "A6") { tones.push(1760); } if(T == "AS6") { tones.push(1865); } if(T == "B6") { tones.push(1976); } if(T == "C7") { tones.push(2093); } if(T == "CS7") { tones.push(2217); } if(T == "D7") { tones.push(2349); } if(T == "DS7") { tones.push(2489); } if(T == "E7") { tones.push(2637); } if(T == "F7") { tones.push(2794); } if(T == "FS7") { tones.push(2960); } if(T == "G7") { tones.push(3136); } if(T == "GS7") { tones.push(3322); } if(T == "A7") { tones.push(3520); } if(T == "AS7") { tones.push(3729); } if(T == "B7") { tones.push(3951); } if(T == "C8") { tones.push(4186); } if(T == "CS8") { tones.push(4435); } if(T == "D8") { tones.push(4699); } if(T == "DS8") { tones.push(4978); } if(D.length <= 2) durations.push(D); else if(D.length > 2) durations.push(D.substr(2));

if(this.arduino === undefined || this.arduino === null || this.arduino.board === undefined || this.arduino.board === null) { alert("Is the Arduino connected?") return; } var myself = this; var array = [0xF0,0x1A]; //Start SysEx, SysEx command array.push(pin); for (i=0; i<=durations.length; i++) { array.push(tones[i]); array.push(durations[i]); } array.push(0xF7); //End SysEx this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));
sum = 0; for(i = 0; i <= durations.length; i++) { if(parseInt(durations[i]) > 0) { sum += 1000/parseInt(durations[i]); } } return sum/1000;
